scripts.gcp:login: docker compose run --rm gcloud 'gcloud auth login'
scripts.gcp:login-app: docker compose run --rm gcloud 'gcloud auth application-default login'
scripts.tf:ssh: ZONE=$(docker compose run --rm terraform output -raw instance_zone) && NAME=$(docker compose run --rm terraform output -raw instance_name) && PROJECT=$(docker compose run --rm terraform output -raw project_id) && docker compose run --rm gcloud "gcloud compute ssh $NAME --project $PROJECT --zone $ZONE"
scripts.tf:stop: ZONE=$(docker compose run --rm terraform output -raw instance_zone) && NAME=$(docker compose run --rm terraform output -raw instance_name) && PROJECT=$(docker compose run --rm terraform output -raw project_id) && docker compose run --rm gcloud "gcloud compute instances stop $NAME --project $PROJECT --zone $ZONE --quiet"
scripts.tf:start: ZONE=$(docker compose run --rm terraform output -raw instance_zone) && NAME=$(docker compose run --rm terraform output -raw instance_name) && PROJECT=$(docker compose run --rm terraform output -raw project_id) && docker compose run --rm gcloud "gcloud compute instances start $NAME --project $PROJECT --zone $ZONE --quiet"
scripts.tf:resume: ZONE=$(docker compose run --rm terraform output -raw instance_zone) && NAME=$(docker compose run --rm terraform output -raw instance_name) && PROJECT=$(docker compose run --rm terraform output -raw project_id) && docker compose run --rm gcloud "gcloud compute instances resume $NAME --project $PROJECT --zone $ZONE --quiet"
scripts.tf:suspend: ZONE=$(docker compose run --rm terraform output -raw instance_zone) && NAME=$(docker compose run --rm terraform output -raw instance_name) && PROJECT=$(docker compose run --rm terraform output -raw project_id) && docker compose run --rm gcloud "gcloud compute instances suspend $NAME --project $PROJECT --zone $ZONE --quiet"
